attributes.action: Don't be so soft on the liars in the Police (plebgate)
attributes.additional_details:
reference 'Plebgate'. How can it be satisfactory for a police officer to lie, to tell a pork pie? An apology is NOT enough for wrecking someones career. EVERY person in a position of responsibility in the management chain above the officers concerned should be sacked immediately with no pension. If you are paid for a responsible position you need to take responsibility. The police officers them selves need to be locked away for the offence - a minimum of 10 years. Every case they have ever been involved in needs re-opening and examining, if they lied over this what else did they lie over?
Nothing less than this is acceptable, nothing.

rejection.details: This is a police disciplinary matter
